Articles.Content: I think I found an easter egg...

Join the other... Umm...

17631550 users! Just a rough estimation. I am curious of how long this has been in there.
its been there since 0.24 i think, it has 40% chance of spawning

its been there since 0.24 i think, it has 40% chance of spawning

I think it's 1/40 isn't it? I've not seen it yet myself (been playing since 0.90 came out).

I've only seen it once since 1.0 and that was in 1.0.4

I make a habit of screenshotting every time I see the castle, which was alot in .90(multiple times a week)

I am curious tho, is there somewhere on the mun where there is a sand castle? I'd love to recreate that scene

its been there since 0.24 i think, it has 40% chance of spawning

I've seen it in 0.18, I think it was there as long as that scene was there
I've never seen it
not sure how often it spawns, 10-20% of the time I think. It's random though.
I'm playing KSP now for many many hours, but I've never ever seen the Mun Castle :/
I saw it for the first time back in 0.25
It's rare but it's there, I'm not sure if it really counts as an easter egg though, as usually easter eggs reference something outside the game, like the face of Carl Sagan on Tylo (since removed).
I've only seen this awesome thing once.
I've only seen it once as well.
It's been coming and going since 0.18.4.....but it's still neat to see when it pops up.

It's obviously fake. Look at it.

You'll notice that the shadows go in different directions, as highlighted here.

I find it hard to believe that you actually photographed a Kerbal on the Mun. This must be a hoax.
At this rate SQUAD's going to have to remove this feature to avoid forum spam. It will become a melancholic legend of old just like the Magic Boulder... :\
I suspect the probability of it showing up was greatly reduced somewhere along the way. I've been here since 0.23, and haven't had it come up even once.

At this rate SQUAD's going to have to remove this feature to avoid forum spam. It will become a melancholic legend of old just like the Magic Boulder... :\

GASP!!

How DARE thee speak ill of the magic boulder!?

It is GODLIKE!!
I believe I saw it mentioned on the Wiki and it's added (with a random chance to appear) by some mod.
I must wonder... if one were to search... might she find the sand castle on the mun, in-game. *that* would be something!
"Jeb, when we asked you to collect surface samples..."

Considering the munar dust is extremely dry and hard to pack... that you need to provide moisture to form it...

...Enjoy.
Never seen the castle. What I've seen, however, is jeb without a helmet, in the Mun.

I've never got that screen.

Maybe I play KSP not enough.

The hoax mun landing shot was added by a mod. The castle is a stock thing. Perhaps Kerbals on EVA should have an option to build a castle (like plant flag) when they're feeling very happy (and are somewhere a castle could be built).
